component.name: InputFile
component.extendsTags: AltInherited AutocompleteInherited DisabledInherited FacesMessageLabelInherited HTMLAccessibilityEvents HTMLInputEvents SizeInherited
component.description: InputFile is a UIInput component that renders an <input> element with type=file. Since it extends HtmlInputFile, it supports all the features of h:inputFile and also supports multi-file uploads.

attribute.description: When this flag is true, files are uploaded automatically as soon as they are selected. The default value is false.
attribute.name: auto

attribute.description: A method that is executed when a file is uploaded. The method must be public, return void, and take a FileUploadEvent argument.
attribute.name: fileUploadListener

attribute.description: HTML passthrough attribute specifying whether or not multiple files can be uploaded. Valid values are blank (to upload a single file) or "multiple" (to upload multiple files).
attribute.name: multiple

attribute.description: HTML passthrough attribute specifying the maximum length of characters allowed in the element.
attribute.name: maxlength

attribute.description: List of CSS class names (separated by spaces) that are to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass
